result.title: BackTracking and TL
result.content:
I noticed that sometimes my code get TL when i use backtracking technique, but when i see others' codes i find their codes using backtracking too but they didn't exceed the time limit

so i wanna know why?? or what faults may i do lead to TL ??

this two codes which get TL 38717740 38706236

Thanks.
